# PKAddPassButtonStyle.black

**Case**

A black button with white lettering.

## Declaration

```swift
case black
```

## Discussion

Use this style when displaying a button against a light background. 

## Constants

- **PKAddPassButtonStyle.blackOutline**: A black button with a light outline.
